it.polimi.se2018.utils

Class XmlLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.XmlLoader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XmlCardLoader, XmlClientConfigLoader, XmlServerConfigLoader

    public abstract class XmlLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class that contains the common methods for the classes that load xml files.
    Author:
    michelamarzollo

        protected javax.xml.validation.Validator getValidator(java.io.InputStream schemaStream)
                                               throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Creates a validator object for xml descriptions.
        Parameters:
        schemaStream - the stream of the xsd file used to validate the xml files.
        Returns:
        A validator object for xml descriptions.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if the validator can't be instantiated.

      • isValid

        protected boolean isValid(java.io.InputStream stream)
        Validates file against the xsd given in getValidator().
        Parameters:
        stream - The file to be validated.
        Returns:
        true if the file a valid against the xsd description; false otherwise.
